ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Remove me
ygData.msgSnippet: My lvl 17 bard was killing wisps with instruments only in WEst Commons yesterday! And she even got XP on a minority of them! (Mandolin equipped. Twisting DoT
ygData.messageBody:
My lvl 17 bard was killing wisps with instruments only in WEst
Commons yesterday!

And she even got XP on a minority of them!

(Mandolin equipped. Twisting DoT and Bellow. RArely getting down
enough to twist in hymn as well)

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Meara, level 18 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
<lvl 6 paladin -- baby BASHer!>

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
>Sent: Monday, April 17, 2000 11:34 AM

>This list is what its subscribers make of it. If you have a low level
>question, ask it. If you found a neat trick low level bards can use, post
>it. Not all subscribers are planes travellers.
>
>Peace
>Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
